statements: DELETE FROM location_quests WHERE location_id = 5 AND level_required > 20;
DELETE FROM location_quests WHERE quest_id = 1 AND level_required > 10;
DELETE FROM location_quests WHERE reward_type = 'gold' OR (location_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND reward_amount >= 100);
DELETE FROM missions WHERE location = 'Forest' AND required_level > 10;
DELETE FROM missions WHERE location = 'Forest' AND required_level > 10;
